relationships.description: Email communication sharing political polling data

analysis.purpose: To share recent political polling data showing Donald Trump's performance against Hillary Clinton following the RNC convention
analysis.significance: Shows communication about political polling between Richard Kahn and Jeffrey Epstein during the 2016 presidential election

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - simply sharing polling data

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - only sharing of publicly available polling data

public_knowledge.context: Polling data from major news organizations (CNN/ORC, CBS News) that would have been publicly available during the 2016 presidential election

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein with recent polling data showing Donald Trump receiving a bounce in the polls following the Republican National Convention, with Trump leading Hillary Clinton in multiple polls.
